Package moa.gui.visualization

Class ParamGraphCanvas

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • moa.gui.visualization.AbstractGraphCanvas
              • moa.gui.visualization.ParamGraphCanvas

  • public class ParamGraphCanvas
extends AbstractGraphCanvas
    ParamGraphCanvas is an implementation of AbstractGraphCanvas showing the relation between a parameter and the measures.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1 $
    Author:
    Tim Sabsch (tim.sabsch@ovgu.de)
    See Also:
    AbstractGraphCanvas, Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ParamGraphCanvas​()
      Initialises a ProcessGraphCanvas by calling the super constructor with a ParamGraphAxes as instance of AbstractGraphAxes and GraphScatter as instance of AbstractGraphPlot.

      • setGraph

        public void setGraph​(MeasureCollection[] measures,
                     MeasureCollection[] measureStds,
                     double[] variedParamValues,
                     java.awt.Color[] colors)
        Sets the scatter graph.
        Parameters:
        measures - information about the curves
        measureStds - standard deviation for the measures
        variedParamValues - values of the varied parameter
        colors - color encoding for the param array
